item.title: OSCP and PWK in Hindsight
item.description: Why? While I may be the millionth person to blog about their OSCP experience, I have the relatively unique perspective of completing both the PWK v1 and PWK v2 content. This gives me intimate familiarity with the changes the course has undergone and whether PWK v1 era advice is still applicable. If not, at least I can look back on this years from now and reflect on the path I’ve taken.
